atk-abh03a17:2_2: Tattha ye arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ appatte pattasaññīnaṁ adhimānikānaṁ kuhakānaṁ vā arahattaṁ paṭijānantānaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhiṁ disvā “mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṁ upasaṁharantī”ti maññanti;
atk-abh03a17:2_3: seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca;
atk-abh03a17:2_4: te sandhāya atthi arahatoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a17:2_5: Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti, tasmā atthi arahato rāgoti anuyogo āraddho.
atk-abh03a17:3_0: Mārakāyikā devatā attanotiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṁ devatānaṁ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi, aññesampi sukkaṁ gahetvā na upasaṁharanti, arahato pana sukkameva natthi, tasmā na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:4_0: Neva attanotipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṁharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:4_1: Lomakūpehītipañhe sappitelānaṁ viya lomakūpehi upasaṁharaṇābhāvaṁ disvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:5_1: “Arahā nu kho ahaṁ, no”ti evaṁ vimatiṁ gāhayissāmāti evaṁ vacasāyaṁ katvā upasaṁharantīti attho.
atk-abh03a17:5_2: Atthi arahato vimatīti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṁ vicikicchaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyaṁ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:6_0: 309.Atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṁ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a17:10_1: Idāni aññāṇaṁ, kaṅkhā, paravitaraṇāti tisso kathā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a17:10_2: Tattha yesaṁ “arahato itthipurisādīnaṁ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṁ, tattheva sanniṭṭhānābhāvena atthi kaṅkhā.
atk-abh03a17:10_3: Yasmā ca nesaṁ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti, tasmā nesaṁ atthi paravitaraṇā”ti imā laddhiyo, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:10_4: tesaṁ tā laddhiyo bhindituṁ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa.
atk-abh03a17:10_5: Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṁ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a17:13_2: Tattha yesaṁ “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:13_3: te sandhāya samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṁ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:13_4: Puna sabbatthāti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_5: Sabbadāti kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṁ sabbaṁ samāpattikālaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_6: Sabbesaṁ samāpannānanti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:13_7: Sabbasamāpattīsūti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṁ lokuttaraṁ sabbañca lokiyasamāpattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:14_1: Idaṁ “yāni cittāni vacīviññattiṁ samuṭṭhāpenti, tāneva kāyaviññattiṁ.
atk-abh03a17:14_2: Evaṁ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī”ti codanatthaṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a17:14_3: Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a17:14_4: Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe “dukkha”nti vācaṁ bhāsati, “samudayo”tiādikampi bhāseyya.
atk-abh03a17:14_5: Yadi vā taṁ na bhāsati, itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṁ dukkhanti jānantotiādayo pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a17:14_6: Itaro pana attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a17:14_7: Lokuttaraṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ samāpanno dukkhadukkhanti vipassatīti hissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a17:15_1: Sotanti sotaviññāṇaṁ adhippetaṁ, yena taṁ saddaṁ suṇāti.
atk-abh03a17:16_0: 329.No vata re vattabbeti yadi avisesena yaṁkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, na avisesena vattabbaṁ “samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo”ti.
atk-abh03a17:16_2: Yaṁ panetena “sikhissa ānanda, bhagavato”ti pariyosāne suttaṁ ābhataṁ, tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito, kāyabhedopi tena samuṭṭhātiyeva, na ca taṁ lokuttaraṁ paṭhamajjhānacittaṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a17:19_2: Tattha “dukkhaṁ dukkhanti vācaṁ bhāsanto dukkhe ñāṇaṁ āharati, taṁ dukkhāhāro nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a17:19_3: Tañca panetaṁ maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpanna”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:19_4: te sandhāya dukkhāhāroti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:19_5: Ye kecīti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyapañhe vipassake sandhāya paṭijānāti, taṁ panassa laddhimattameva.
atk-abh03a17:22_2: Tattha yesaṁ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca anuppabandhena pavattamānaṁ disvā “ekameva cittaṁ ciraṁ tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṁ andhakānaṁ, taṁladdhivisodhanatthaṁ ekaṁ, cittaṁ divasaṁ tiṭṭhatīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:22_3: Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇoti ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṁ anāmasitvā “aniccā vata saṅkhārā, uppādavayadhammino”ti desanānayena uppādavayavaseneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a17:23_0: Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattāti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:23_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṁ icchati, taṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:23_2: Yāvatāyukaṁ tiṭṭhatīti pañhe “cullāsītisahassāni, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū”tiādivacanavasena āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati, āruppe paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:23_3: Muhuttaṁ muhuttaṁ uppajjatīti pañhe paravādissa “uppādavayadhammino”tiādisuttavirodhabhayena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:26_2: Tattha yesaṁ “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, ādittaṁ sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”tiādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā vītaccitaṅgārasammissā chārikanirayasadisā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi gokulikānaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:26_3: tesaṁ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṁ laddhiṁ vivecetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:26_4: Tattha anodhiṁ katvāti odhiṁ mariyādaṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ akaritvā, avisesena sabbeyevāti attho.
atk-abh03a17:26_5: Sesaṁ sabbaṁ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṁ saddhiṁ suttasādhanāyāti.
atk-abh03a17:29_0: 339. Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ –
atk-abh03a17:32_0: Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese dukkhadassanena pajahati, ekacce samudayanirodhamaggadassanena, tathā sesāpīti evaṁ soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṁ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī”ti evarūpā nānābhisamayaladdhi uppannā, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakasabbatthikasammitiyabhadrayānikānaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:32_1: tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ anupubbābhisamayoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a17:32_2: Anupubbena sotāpattimagganti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:32_4: Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti paṭijānāti, phalaṁ pana ekameva icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:33_0: 344.Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṁ apariniṭṭhitaṁ, maggadassanena pariniṭṭhitaṁ nāma hoti, tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṁ gacchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:34_0: 345.Dukkhediṭṭhe cattāri saccānīti pucchā paravādissa, ekābhisamayavasena paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a17:34_1: Puna dukkhasaccaṁ cattāri saccānīti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a17:35_0: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭheti pucchā sakavādissa, samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi paṭividdhā hontīti laddhiyā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:36_1: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti sāvakānaṁ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca.
atk-abh03a17:36_3: Catucattārīsāya ñāṇehīti “jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṁ, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa”nti evaṁ nidānavagge vuttañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a17:36_4: Sattasattatiyā ñāṇehīti “jarāmaraṇaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṁ tattheva vuttañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a17:39_2: Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a17:39_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:40_0: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti ettha yadi so lokuttare paṭihaññeyya.
atk-abh03a17:40_2: Lokiye paṭihaññamānassa pana lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a17:40_7: Sabbe te maggaṁ bhāventīti pañhesu ye maggaṁ nappaṭilabhanti, te sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:42_2: Lokiyaṁ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi.
atk-abh03a17:45_2: Tattha yesaṁ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahisāsakānañceva andhakānañca;
atk-abh03a17:45_3: te sandhāya dve nirodhāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a17:45_4: Dve dukkhanirodhāti pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:45_5: Yasmā dvīhākārehi dukkhaṁ nirujjhatīti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a17:45_6: Dve nirodhasaccānītipañhesu dvinnaṁ dukkhasaccānaṁ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:46_0: Atthi dvinnaṁ nibbānānantiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a17:47_0: Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddheti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṁ vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti, te saṅkhāre.
atk-abh03a17:47_4: Tattha bhaggānaṁ puna abhañjanato appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṁ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṁ paṭijānāti.
